body.name: Super Retro Game Console Classic Mini HDMI System with Built in 821 Old School Video Games, Super Classic System, Plug and Play

features: Notes - 1.Some games are NOT in English, 2.The game progress cannot be saved, but you can pause the games by START. 3. To change to another game, press RESET on the front panel. Troubleshooting method of product not working: 1.Check whether the power is normal and whether the socket itself is powered on (whether the device indicator is on). 2.Check whether the data cable and power cable are loose.3.Check whether the device has an HDMI jack.4. Check whether the TF card is properly inserted

Plug & Play - No need to predownload games or insert cards, plug and play,just connect your console and controller and you're ready to play.you can use the mini console in big screen with HDMI input.Equipped with 2 gampads,comfortable feel, can better share your fun with family and friends.

Game consoles with built in games - The classic game console built-in 821 different games, including dozens of the most classic classic video games, Notes Part: There are some game repetitions in this console.The number of non-repetitive games is about 760，But you can always find the games you like.

Perfect customer service - If you are not satisfied with our Classic Mini Retro Game Console,please contact us and we will solve your problem at the first time. We can replace a faulty product or refund.

Game system - The classic mini retro game console with unchanged styles,simple joysticks,old-fashioned plastic materials and familiar touch,this is the old retro game console we used to be familiar with. bring you immediately to your childhood.
body.description: 【Notes】1.Some games are NOT in English, 2.The game progress cannot be saved, but you can pause the games by START. 3. To change to another game, press RESET on the front panel. Troubleshooting method of product not working: 1.Check whether the power is normal and whether the socket itself is powered on (whether the device indicator is on). 2.Check whether the data cable and power cable are loose.3.Check whether the device has an HDMI jack.4. Check whether the TF card is properly inserted

productInformation.value: 3.5 3.5 out of 5 stars 32 ratings 3.5 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars We love this product
reviews.reviewText: This product is wonderful for the money and we are really enjoying playing it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Every game we try to play… it’ll start, then glitch up after about 10 secs. Just like the original used to do, but there’s no cartridge to blow into this time. Very dissatisfied with this purchase. I missed the return by date, but I really think I should get a refund since we haven’t been able to play a single game on it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Kids love it!!!
reviews.reviewText: Highly recommend. Lots of great games from my childhood.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Works alright for price - NOT SNES games
reviews.reviewText: Its fun for kids and to have a level play ground to play against friends who use different platforms, (especially for the price) but it actually only has nintendo games not super nintendo games. Was expecting SNES games since the console is emulating one, but def not snes games.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars egh it worked.
reviews.reviewText: works.. can play retro games.. controllers are straight garbage tho. cant even run and slide while playing mario cuz it doesnt register sometimes.. but it was cheap. what can ya expect?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Junk games are crap

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Fun to play. Good selection of classic games
